name: jOeSU
description:
jOeSU is a rythm game with WASD controls. Large list of songs, I'm very actively working on this.

Hit all the buttons to the sound of the music, get the biggest combo you can, try to reach for the highest scores.

(the level editor should be something to avoid since I haven't polished it yet, and to somebody just going in it wouldn't make any sense)

Note placement can be off at times. This is due to me wanting to work on the game itself and the songs can be properly polished once I'm happy with the game itself

If i have used anything you have created, tell me and I will ASAP remove it if you want.

Here is some raw footage:

All known problems.bugs:

1. After beating the tutorial, the score end-screen doesn't appear properly only for that level.

2. report any more to me!

Currently working on:

Creating your own cusom songs and having them added to the menu. Once this is complete (about 75% done)  the game's size will be hundreds of MB smaller, and songs can be distributed through a folder containing its data. Not only does this allow for great customization , you dont need to have songs that you know you wont play eating up your disk space. Also user-generated content is always just great.
